alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:46PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Garden and southwestern Sheridan Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 645 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antioch, or 19 miles east of Alliance, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Snow Lake, Miles Lake, Wickson Lake, Patterson Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Britton Lake, Krause Lake, Tralnor Lake and Wild Horse Flats. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 13. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
